Class Session

java.lang.Object
  Session

public class Session
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds the methods for controlling sessions

The class variables request, EID, UID, session are declared as static because, the same copy of these variable must be accessed by all of the instances.

Author:
Deepak Undrakonda, Sandeep Taduri & Haroon Ashraf

Constructor Summary
Session()
           
 
Method Summary
static java.lang.String getEID()
          This method is used to retrieve current user's staff_id by using Session attribute EID
static java.lang.String getUsername()
          This method is used to retrieve current user's staff_username by using Session attribute UID
static void setVariables(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, java.lang.String ID, java.lang.String uname)
          This method sets the variables request, EID(staff_id) and UID(staff_username) which are used to assign set attributes.
static void startSession()
          This method starts the session and set Session attributes EID and UID where EID hold staff_id and UID holds Staff_username of the user signed in.
static void stopSession()
          This method is used to invalidate the session.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Method Detail

setVariables

public static void setVariables(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                java.lang.String ID,
                                java.lang.String uname)
This method sets the variables request, EID(staff_id) and UID(staff_username) which are used to assign set attributes.

Parameters:
req - - (request)
ID - - (staff_id of the current user)
uname - - (staff_username of the current user)

startSession

public static void startSession()
This method starts the session and set Session attributes EID and UID where EID hold staff_id and UID holds Staff_username of the user signed in.

getUsername

public static java.lang.String getUsername()
This method is used to retrieve current user's staff_username by using Session attribute UID

Returns:
uname - (staff_username of the current user)

getEID

public static java.lang.String getEID()
This method is used to retrieve current user's staff_id by using Session attribute EID

Returns:
ID - (staff_id of the current user)

stopSession

public static void stopSession()
This method is used to invalidate the session.
